properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 11:46AM CST until January 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...

Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam affecting Posey and Union Counties

.Rainfall over the past 24 hours is now expected to cause the Ohio
River at J.T. Myers to climb just above flood stage tomorrow morning.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam.
* from this evening to late Sunday night.
* At 11:00 AM Saturday the stage was 36.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 37.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 37.1 feet by
tomorrow morning. The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow
night.
* Impact...At 37.0 Feet...Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly
bottomland and surrounding low lying areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
